channel.title: Talks on Michael Abadi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Michael Abadi's Blog

item.title: Discover Swift Package Manager
item.description: Swift ID Dev is an Indonesian study group community that is being organized by Nico. In this session, I mentored iOS developers about how to create a simple package manager for personal project as well basic foundation of a modularization. Slides: https://github.com/abadikaka/conference-and-talks/blob/main/SPM.key AppCoda - Mastering SwiftUI - One of the best book out there for accelerating your understanding of SwiftUI. Use discount code "launch2021" while you are purchasing this book throughout this link.

item.title: Mentorship in WWDC Community 2021
item.description: WWDC Mentorship Week, organized by WWDC Community 2021. During this WWDC 2021 week, I volunteered to help the community by giving a free mentorship and share my experience about working as an iOS Engineer to those who booked my sessions. I have succesfully mentored 12 student from Indonesia and 1 student from Malaysia. AppCoda - Mastering SwiftUI - One of the best book out there for accelerating your understanding of SwiftUI.

item.title: iOS Dev Thailand Conference 2020
item.description: Session 1 : Unboxing the debugger: Broke the myth of debugging in iOS in an easy way by Michael Abadi, Agoda. In this conference, I was presenting a session about debugging in iOS followed by a presentation from Federico Zanetello about Swift Package Manager AppCoda - Beginner Book iOS15 - Want to start as iOS Programmer but dunno where to start? Beginner book from AppCoda is the one to go.

item.title: iOS Indonesia Conference 2020
item.description: In this conference, I was presenting a session about debugging in iOS followed by a presentation from Edward Anthony about Network Abstraction Layer and Bondan Eko Prasetyo about Modularization at Scale. AppCoda - Beginner Book iOS15 - Want to start as iOS Programmer but dunno where to start? Beginner book from AppCoda is the one to go. Start your journey with this book without any hesitation.
